  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Refléter la lumière du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">Reflecting light from the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflektierendes Licht von der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz refletindo do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce riflettente dal sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση του φωτός από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz de reflejo del sol</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que les choses qui ne  donnent pas de la lumière elles-même réfléchissent la lumière qui  vient du soleil afin qu'elles puissent être vues.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that things that don't give out their own light reflects light that comes from the sun in order for them to be seen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ligne de vue</string>
            <string language="en">line of sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">voyant</string>
            <string language="en">seeing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Sachen, die nicht aus 
ihrem geben, eigenes Licht Licht reflektiert, das von der Sonne damit 
gesehen zu werden kommt sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as coisas que não 
dão para fora do seu própria luz refletem a luz que vem do sol para 
que ele a ser visto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le cose che non 
danno verso l'esterno il loro la propria luce riflette la luce che 
viene dal sole nell'ordine affinchè loro sia vista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα πράγματα που δεν 
δίνουν έξω το φως τους απεικονίζουν το φως που προέρχεται από τον
ήλιο για βλέπουνε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las cosas que no 
dan fuera de su propia luz reflejan la luz que viene del sol en la 
orden para que él sea considerado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geometrische Sicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha de vista</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riga di vista</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vedere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμή θέας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">να δει</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήλιος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión ligera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">línea de la vista</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el ver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sol</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
